Stomach: Excessive thirst, continued vomiting burning in throat and stomach
Dyspepsia with copious secretion of mucus
Abdomen: Pain around umbilicus and region of loins
Stool color of coffee-grounds , with brown and dry tongue, and dark-green vomiting

details: Found in grapes, pineapple, sorrel and other fruits. It is an antiscorbutic antiseptic, stimulating the mucous and salivary secretions. Dullness and lassitude. Great weakness, with diarrhoea, with dry and brown tongue. Pain in heels. (PHYTOL.)
name: Tartaricum acidum
dosage: Third trituration. The pure acid 10-30 grains dissolved in water.
